Learning at your Fingertips

Lemniscate Institute is a non-profit organization that aims to guide and teach students from diverse backgrounds with subjects both in engineering and technology programs.

As you are reading this, you are probably one of the few people that have witnessed this website’s progress. As such, your feedback is extremely valuable in terms of enhancing and improving this website and its future contents.

Email: lemniscate.institute@gmail.com

Message from the Team

Welcome to this learning space! It is our hope that we will be able to contribute to your quest for knowledge in engineering and technology.

At present, you may still find the website incomplete, as we are still working on finalizing and/or improving the existing contents. However, we are aiming to have additional courses in the near future that will make your stay here more fruitful and enjoyable. Currently, we are working with only a handful of writers, so please bear with us as our progress may be slow but it is progress nonetheless.

If now, you are fully engaging with a specific course, it means that you might be one of our students. Regardless, we wish you the best of luck and we hope that you find this website useful in your studies. Please do not hesitate to contact us for your feedback and suggestions. Happy learning!
